snippet: Brendan Shanahan has left his job as the N.H.L.’s chief disciplinarian to become the president of the Toronto Maple Leafs.
abstract: Slap Shot column; Brendan Shanahan leaves his job as the NHL’s chief disciplinarian to become the president of the Toronto Maple Leafs; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brendan Shanahan has left his job as the N.H.L.’s chief disciplinarian to become the president of the Toronto Maple Leafs.

headline.main: Shanahan Made the N.H.L. a Safer Place
headline.print_headline: Shanahan Made the N.H.L. a Safer Place
